subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Fabio Quagliarella headed in a goal less than 30 seconds after he took the field, helping Italy beat Portugal, 3-1, in Zurich.Luca Toni put Italy ahead in the 45th minute. Italy, the defending World Cup champion, scored again in the 51st when Milan midfielder Andrea Pirlo scored to the lower-right corner.
